gestationalAge.title: Gestational age (weeks)
gestationalAge.subtitle: (9 max)
gestationalAge.body: Calculate GA in weeks at birth based preferably on due date determined by 1<sup>st</sup> trimester ultrasound. If that is unavailable, use the gestational age assessment at delivery (Ballard or Dubowitz)

race.title: Race
race.subtitle: (2 max)
race.body: If the infant is either Black or Hispanic race assign 2 points. If both, assign only 2 points. If not Black or hispanic, assign 0 points.

outborn.title: Outborn
outborn.subtitle: (3 max)
outborn.body: If the infant is transferred into this center from another hospital at any time after birth, assign 3 points.
